collection_you_are_looking_for_does_not_: Collection you are looking for does not exists
if_the_name_is_empty_then_its_value_will: If the collection name is empty then its value will have the same value as default language.
the_name_of_collection_maximum_limit_cha: The name of collection. Maximum {limit} characters
you_can_not_delete_this_collection_you_c: You cannot delete this collection. You can drag & drop to re-order images
images_should_be_in_width_x_height_ratio: Images should be in {width}x{height} ({x}:{y}) for the best layout. Max size of each image is {size}.
if_set_as_default_this_collection_is_act: If set as default, this collection is activated and the current default one will be set inactive.
are_you_sure_if_set_as_default_this_coll: Are you sure? If set as default, this collection is activated and the current default one will be set inactive.
you_cannot_activate_this_collection_beca: You cannot activate this collection because the maximum of active collections is 2
please_remove_all_error_files_first: Please remove all error files first!
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_ima: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
collection_can_not_found_or_you_can_not_: Collection cannot found or you cannot delete it
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_col: Are you sure you want to delete this collection permanently?
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_these_co: Are you sure you want to delete these collection(s) permanently?
you_can_upload_a_jpg_jpeg_or_png_file: You can upload a JPG, JPEG or PNG file.
drag_n_drop_multi_images_here_to_upload: Drag & drop multi images here to upload
maximum_images_you_can_upload_is_number: Maximum images you can upload is: {number}
the_file_size_limit_is_file_size_if_your: The file size limit is {file_size}. If your upload does not work, try uploading a smaller image.
the_first_image_is_used_as_collection_s_: The first image is used as collection's Main image, you can drag & drop to re-order.
